name: E680 / E680i / A780 Kernel sources
short_description: This are the GPL-kernel Sources of Motorola's E680, E680i and A780. Projects main goal is to share this sources to every interested one. Second goal is to share kernel modules, based on this sources. Dont hesitate to contact me if you build modules.
